location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: 'Sketch map of the Persian Gulf & Arab Coast'

physicalDescription.extent: Dimensions:430 x 461 mm, on sheet 482 x 504 mm

mods.abstract: Imprint:Topographical Section, General Staff, No. 2037. War Office, March, 1905.Distinctive Features:Printed map of the south-eastern portion of the Arabian Peninsula produced in connection with file on Arbitration by Hague Tribunal on question of French flags on Omani dhows. The ff.58-59A discuss the geography of Oman in reference to Kiepert's map.Contains notations of terrain features and vegetation, with Indo-European overland and submarine telegraph line and roads shown.
